The advanced lucky draw can only be opened after %1$s-%2$s (Saudi Arabia time) and needs the progress bar is full, it is currently inaccessible Your draw times All servers times 1 lucky draws %s advanced lucky draws Fill in You draw %1$s times in ordinary lottery today, you still need %2$s times,so you can participate in advanced lottery End the vote Close countdown time Vote options Option Add an option Vote time: Now- At least two options Note: cannot be changed after voting %s people participated in voting who do you want to @ Vote will end on %s You can not @ the same one in one post Change If you need a custom Special ID number, please contact the official accounts Welcome to Bobo, come and tell me who you are, so that more friends can discover you Choose vote type Text Vote Voting options can only be text Picture Vote Voting options can only be picture 1. You can contact the official accounts to purchase the Hot room stick top privilege. Different time periods and different locations correspond to different prices %s gold coin 2. After confirming the time and location with the official account, your room will be displayed at the top of the room list on the Hot page 1. You can contact the official accounts to purchase the Hot Post top privilege. Different time periods and different locations correspond to different prices %s gold coin 2. After confirming the time and location with the official account, your post will be displayed at the top of the recommended posts 1. You can contact the official accounts to purchase the Hot Banner privilege. Different time periods and different locations correspond to different prices %s gold coin 2. After confirming the time and location with the official account, your banner will be displayed at Hot page banner\'s CP SALE Special ID Other The more regular draws you have, the better your chances of winning the super prize in the advanced draw You can @10 friends at most Click the %s for the moment you like Click the %s to make a comment %s EXP %s times Automatic use If you don\'t meet the advanced lottery conditions today, please try again tomorrow End time of the vote 1.Spend 500 gold coins for a advanced lucky draw\n 2.The more times you draw in normal draw, the higher probability in advanced lucky draw\n 3.The advanced lucky draw will be turned on from time to time vote ended The lamb treasure box in this room has been upgraded, you can go to other rooms to participate in the event~ Treasure chest contribution leaderboard of this level Congratulations on getting the Eid al-Adha event frame~ This special effect will continue to be displayed for 10 minutes after the gift is given, continue to send event gifts to maintain the special effect~ Continue to send gifts Next level is even more surprising! The more event gifts you send out, the greater prize you could win~ Open treasure box There is no other game room online now Region Order Number: %s Recharge Agent recharge Recharge Agent Details Continue to give gifts Prioritize the display of special effects of relationship After it is enabled, the special effect of relationship will be displayed first when you are on the mic with your close friends Please choose other way~ Month List Battle settings Battle time Battle punishment Picture round Nickname round Customize %s Mins The loser\'s nickname will be changed to Loser for 5 minutes The loser\'s profile picture will be changed to Bomberman for 5 minutes According to the punishment written by both parties, the loser should accept the agreed punishment. Red and blue must have at least one player on the mic Activate Battle mode? After activating, the room will become a 5v5 red-blue duel style. The winner will be determined by sending gifts within the specified time, and the loser will be punished~ Want to ask the owner of the room to turn on battle mode? After activating, the room will become a 5v5 red-blue duel style. The winner will be determined by sending gifts within the specified time, and the loser will be punished~ There is already an event in the current room, and the battle can only be started after it is over The current room is in Battle, and the Battle mode can only be turned off after the end The battle mode has been activated, join the battle~ The battle in the room is in progress, you can\'t operate the microphone until the battle is over The battle between red and blue depends on sending gifts to decide the winner After the battle is started, you can no longer change the microphone position at will! Send gifts to increase the battle value, help your favorite team win the battle SVIP gifts can bring x2 battle value The loser needs to accept the punishment~ The profile picture of the losing side will become the system picture You can discuss the punishment , and the loser must accept the punishment~ Try our new mic interactive gift The nickname of the loser will change to %s Waiting Start Battle During the battle The battle mode has been opened, let everyone join the battle~ %s wants to open the room battle mode, red and blue team battle is more fun! Battle is on! Share the room to call more friends to watch! Send gifts to the team you support! Help the red team Stay in front! Send your gift now! Help the blue team Stay in front! Send your gift now! There are still 5s for the battle to end! Help the red team overtake the opponent! There are still 5s for the battle to end! Help the blue team overtake the opponent! Activate Battle Live income New followers Effective microphone number 15 people in the room at the same time Room mode Battle The Battle has ended, click to view the result details~ The current room is in Battle, you can switch to another mode after closing the Battle mode Leader The phone you\'re using doesn\'t support it

You must be a SVIP to send this gift become SVIP Lucky Wheel won %s gold coins Rules 1. The Lucky wheel is %1$s gold coins per 1 time, %2$s gold coins per %3$s times, ten consecutive spins are even more favorable! 2. Every time you turn The Lucky wheel, there is a chance to get the corresponding gold coin award or medal reward on the wheel 3. The more times you participate, the greater the probability of winning the prize~ I won the grand prize of %s gold coins on the lucky wheel. Come and try your luck too. Won a gift worth %s gold coin in lucky wheel, come and try it too! %1$s won the grand prize %2$s gold coins on the lucky wheel, come to the lucky room~ %1$s won a gift prize worth %2$s gold coins on the lucky wheel, come to the lucky room~ Come play the lucky wheel and win more coins~ Today\'s Ranking Yesterday\'s Ranking Close after %s seconds Spinning Speeding up I won a title on the Lucky Wheel. Go upload your nice photos Upload By sending a relationship card, you can request for relationship and apply to become a CP with the other party! Car Frame Theme Bubble Tag yourself, let others know more about u~ The number of card swipes today has reached the limit, please try again tomorrow~ The number of likes today has reached the limit, please come again tomorrow~ You need to upload a photo and select a tag to generate your card. I\'m a little excited when I see your photo card. Let\'s chat. %1$s send to %2$s Gift %3$s, Amazing~ come! %1$s sent %2$s x1 %1$s We are in BoBo room %2$s Glory！ We are in BoBo room %s %s Glory！ Photo Card Game Rules 1. Complete your photo information and tag information, and you can start the exciting photo card game. 2. When you like a photo that interests you, you can click the heart button or swipe the card to the left to say hello to the other person. 3. It doesn\'t matter if you haven\'t encountered a heart-warming photo, swipe the card to the right to find the next photo card 4. The maximum number of swipes per day is 20, and the maximum number of swipes and greetings per day is 5. Please treasure the number of swipes and greetings ~ don’t miss your chance Gift Card Saved Improving your photo information and tags can increase other\'s response rate~ Complete information Photo card Swipe photos left or right Slide cards left or right Click to see personal information Room owner sets the bets The most beautiful gift is a banner for two people, and the banner is displayed in all rooms Exclusive customer service 24-hour customer service PK Time Punishment Nickname Punishment Picture After the purchase takes effect, your room ID will be replaced with the purchased Unique Room ID Room ID Invite your friends to your room to help with this PK. Send a Gift! Help this room win the PK There are 30 seconds left in PK! Give me a small gift and help this room win the PK~ Profile picture illegal 1. After the purchase takes effect, your Room ID will be replaced with the purchased Unique Room ID 2. After purchasing, please go to your room to check the new Room ID. lf there is no change, please log out of the account and log in again before entering to view. lf it still does not refresh, please contact customer service Dynamic This gift can be given only when the user level reaches Lv.%s Task system User Level Please switch the room to Normal mode before turning it on Please end %s first and then switch to stage room mode. Select room mode Normal Room Stage Room Only when your personal level reaches 25, or you get the privilege, So you switch to the Stage Room. No items obtained yet Do the task Gift Wall Got it There is still %1$s experience points left, and the user level reaches Lv.%2$s Personal card Level symbol GET Unlock exclusive gifts and room mode Unlock exclusive gifts Unlock room mode Post Theme Homepage Visitors Room Visitors Congratulations, upgraded!! You received a reward During the SVIP is activated, the Room Visitor record will be cleared automatically (SVIP5/6) Google payment function is not available, exit and try again Can support bank card transfer, click for inquiries Car parking gameplay 1. Purchase a specific car and park it in room to get bonus gold coins. 2. The room owner manages the parking area, obtains bonus gold coins, and can also increase the popularity of the room and hit a good position in the room list. 3. Users who use a car with a specific parking area mode will automatically park their car after entering the room and start calculating the parking time. The corresponding reward gold coins will be calculated every half hour. Please pay attention to the gold coin details for details. Go buy a car Attributes 1. Room Popularity: +%s 2. Car income: +%1$s gold coins/%2$smin 3. Parking area income: +%1$s gold coins/%2$smin New Year Weekly Gift Package New Year pack Visit Room incognito After opening, there will be no traces left when visiting other people\'s homepages Once turned on, no records will be left when visiting other people\'s rooms. Visit other people\'s room will not be shown in the other party\'s Room Visitors record. Go to Me>Settings>Incognito mode >Turn on > Balance Round %s of today %1$s WIN %2$s How to Play Select the quantity of golds, and then select animal to spend the golds on If silver “BOBO” wins, 2 animals will be drawn this round, and anyone who chooses these 2 animals will win the coins If Golden “BOBO” wins, 3 animals will be drawn this round, and anyone who chooses these 3 animals will win money You have 23 seconds to select animals for each round, after which the winning animals will be drawn If the animal you choose is the same as the winning animal.you will get the corresponding reward. You can choose up to 4 animals in each round, and bet up to 40,000 gold coins on each animal. New Year’s item, only during the event you can buy, bring them with you to celebrate New Year’s Day~ 4. The homeowner’s own specific car will not receive any income in his own parking area. Gift message Upload new photo Your cumulative charge level has reached %1$s. You have a %2$s Special ID that you have not received yet, valid for 90 days. Please select the Special ID and claim it. Claim Special ID After the Sepcial ID takes effect, your personal ID will be replaced by the new special ID you received. After the Sepcial ID takes effect, your Room ID will be replaced by the new room special ID you received. Notes Are you sure you want to receive this Special ID %s? After receiving it, the previous ID will become invalid. It cannot be replaced back after receiving it, unless you upgrade to a higher recharge level. Close automatically after %s %s wants to enable the 1v1 PK mode in the room. Single PK is super fun! Start 1v1 PK 1v1 PK has started! Share the room to call more friends to watch! After setting the relationship to be pinned, the relationship card will display a long bar style on the homepage and be pinned above the other relationship cards. Basic Advanced Countdown：%s Received %s lucky bag Sent to your account Prize pool total gold coins:%s Result You got %1$s lucky bag (%2$s gold coins) Once you reach the corresponding SVIP level, you can send the following gifts. During the event, you will receive double SVIP points after sending the above gifts. During non-event periods, giving gifts will accumulate SVIP points normally. Locked Exclusive gifts can be send out when you reach the corresponding SVIP level, and double SVIP points can be obtained during the event. Only SVIP lv%1$s can send these gifts. During the event (every month from %2$sth to %3$sth), you can get double vip points by sending SVIP exclusive gifts
%1$s won %2$s gold coins in the lucky bag 6. During the event, every time you bet 10,000 gold coins, you will get a lucky bag; 7. The lucky bag prize pool is opened every 30 minutes, and users who receive lucky bags can share the gold coins in the prize pool. The more lucky bags they receive, the more gold coins they will share in total! Lucky bag prize pool Lucky bag Total value: Prize pool record During the event, for every 10,000 gold coins bet within 30 minutes, you will receive a lucky bag. Show available to use Show obtained How to obtain Haven\'t use the title yet Title Set Admin Remove Admin Multi-fish BOBO ZOO Pick a relationship card Today we have given each other %s gold coin gifts. Congratulations on becoming close friends, binding the friend relationship, and upgrading to receive rewards~ Relation Card Send back Wall of Honor Agency Millionaire Host Top 10 room value last month Progress Honor description and related rewards How to increase agency point The most improved Agency One million Hosts last month Agency leader Top ten agencies last month Please select the account you want to log in Not completed You have been chosen Value %s Greedy Ticket BoBo zoo Ticket Game Machine Ticket Lucky wheel Ticket Validity: %sh Validity: Receive and use Hide temporarily Please remember to use it within the validity time Join room Congratulations you got Complete the following tasks to receive Top %s Receive gold coins You need to complete the corresponding tasks in order to receive the trial prizes! Complete tasks to receive the prize Please select gift Put the number of gifts Number of gift lucky pack The number of gift lucky pack cannot over the number of gifts placed in it The quantity of this item cannot be 0 Gift lucky pack rules 1. You can buy gifts and send lucky pack. Use the gifts in your backpack. If the gifts are not enough, buy the gifts directly. 2. Select the number of gifts and gift lucky pack. If the total value of the gifts in the lucky pack over 7777 gold coins, a server-wide banner will be released to attract everyone to enter the room to grab the lucky pack. 3. After the gift lucky pack is released, everyone can participate in grabbing the gift lucky pack in the public screen/room and get a random number of gifts in the lucky pack. The result of the lucky pack will be announced in five minutes. The unused gifts will be returned to the sender\'s Backpack. 4. During the lottery draw, participants need to be in the room where the lucky pack is located to be counted among the lucky pack participants. Leaving the room before the draw will be deemed as giving up participating. 5. You can set up only people who follow you to grab gifts lucky pack The room owner\'s wealth needs to reach %s to unlock this feature You need to be on the mic to use this function Close \nGive up the chance to win coins Do you want to prompt the room owner to start the %s game? After confirmation, a prompt will be sent on the public screen to start the game. Wait for the room owner/admin to start the game, and then you can participate~ Won gifts worth %s gold coins Go win gold coins Your trial coupon has expired! Your coupon is not used yet. Bind WhatsApp account Change bind WhatsApp A verification code message has been sent to your WhatsApp %s, please fill in the digital verification code in the message Bind WhatsApp to make your account more secure! Please enter the new WhatsApp account that needs to be bound Send code via WhatsApp Sign in with SMS Code WhatsApp account has been bound Select mobile area code Please enter a valid phone number WhatsApp Button theme VIP rules Normal SVIP Go to recharge to unlock After becoming a VIP, you can get an exclusive title corresponding to the level. The higher the level, the more gorgeous the title will be! After becoming a VIP, you can use the privileged function of sending pictures on the public screen. After becoming a VIP, you can expand the upper limit of friends. The higher the VIP level, the higher the number of expansions. The upper limit of %1$s friends is +%2$s. After becoming a VIP, you can expand the upper limit of following. The higher the VIP level, the higher the number of expansions. The upper limit of following for %1$s is +%2$s. After becoming a VIP, you can get an exclusive room theme. Both VIP1 and VIP6 can unlock new backgrounds. After becoming a VIP, your information will be at the top of the user list, making it easier for everyone to see you in the room. After becoming a VIP, you will get the right to use room sound effects to increase the atmosphere of the room. After becoming VIP2, you will get the right to use the room stage mode to increase the atmosphere of the room. After becoming VIP2, you will receive exclusive entrance effects. Both VIP2 and VIP6 can unlock new entrance effects. After becoming VIP3, you will receive exclusive bubbles. Both VIP3 and VIP7 can unlock new exclusive bubbles. After becoming VIP5, you will receive exclusive frame. Both VIP5 and VIP9 can unlock new exclusive frame. After becoming VIP7, you will receive exclusive title. Both VIP7 and VIP9 can unlock new exclusive titles. After becoming VIP10, you will receive an exclusive backpack gift. Please contact the official stuff for distribution. After becoming VIP10, you will get exclusive mic waves. After becoming VIP9, you will get an exclusive car! SVIP Privileges Need to reach %s to use Stage room mode privileges only available if you reach VIP2 SVIP5 and 6 support gif No Level Please select your room button theme Privileges Level up to advance to the next level Not available yet, recharge more to become a distinguished Vip%s SVIP1 unlock SVIP3 unlock VIP3 unlock Error Set your phone to the correct time and time zone
Auto Reply Content reference Reference:In addition to saying hello,you can writeyour own contact information,payment method,orother preferential information,so that users can know you better and contact you more easily,for example: When others initiate a consultation,the following content will be automatically sent.if not filled, greeting message will be sent automatically: saved successfully hello,so happy to meet you.l am the agent in BOBO. you can also connect me on+01126189271 Send and inquire Recharge level: Payment method supports: area: %s Please inquire for more offers > More discount details
GIF files must be smaller than 10M Double sign-in Sign in and get coins in return Renewal Purchase Ask for Purchase a 30-day Premium membership Time remaining: %s days Including the above %s privileges, get them now 30-Day Privilege Card 1. Users can obtain the corresponding privileges on the privilege description page by purchasing BoBo membership cards directly. The membership card is valid for 30 days. Users can enjoy these privileges within 30 days. After the membership card expires, the privileges will be withdrawn.\n2. The higher the level of the membership card, the more privileges it contains\n3. If you purchase multiple levels of membership cards, the system will prioritize the remaining time of the higher level membership card.\n4. After becoming a premium member, consuming gold coins will generate member points, 1 gold coin = 1 member point. Consumption behaviors include gift sending, lucky draw, egg smashing, and shopping in the store. Member points can be used to redeem unique products in the member points store! Points will not be cleared, and consumption during non-membership period will not be counted into points. %1$s/%2$s Days Premium x2 Being Premium get all rewards x2 Left: %1$s Premium\'s privilege Premium can retrieve coins It\'s not time yet Not received Premium will expire soon You will lose the following privileges: Premium has expired Renew your purchase to regain the following privileges Say Hi VIP1 & Premium Privileges When you become a %1$s Premium, you can receive gold coins %2$s by logging in every day. The higher the Premium level you purchase, the more gold coins you can receive. When you become a Premium, you can get a costume logo corresponding to your Premium level! The higher the Premium level you purchase, the more gorgeous the logo will be! Once you become a Premium , you can receive double rewards by signing in every day! No need to add friends, say hello 24h*%s Once you become a Premium, you can use the privileged function of posting pictures on the room\'s public screen. When you become a Premium, you will get exclusive bubbles for members, and your public screen comments will be more eye-catching. Once you become a Premium, you can upload GIF dynamic profile picture within the validity period. It is very fun to play with profile picture. When you become/renew a Premium , a announcement will be triggered in rooms, congratulations on becoming a Premium When you become a %s Premium , you will get exclusive headwear for members, rich decorations to show your nobility When you become a %1$s Premium, you will get a member-exclusive room Theme, which can be used in room settings to enrich the room atmosphere When you become a %1$s Premium, you will be given the privilege of pinning 3 posts, each time for 30 minutes. When you become a Premium, your information will be pinned to the top of the room user list, making it easier for everyone to see you in the room. Check out Premium membership privileges > Congratulations to %1$s on becoming a %2$s Premium of BoBo Upload Dynamic Picture Premium membership has been automatically used.
